subject: Olympic Games
Pan American Games
lead_paragraph: The United States Olympic Committee apologized yesterday after a worker scrawled “Welcome to the Congo!” on a board in the organization’s Rio de Janeiro news media center for the Pan American Games, which begin Friday. The newspaper O Globo published a photograph of the message on its front page yesterday and ran a headline saying the joke was “full of prejudice.” The U.S.O.C. issued a “deep apology to the people of Brazil and Rio de Janeiro” in a statement yesterday, and said the worker who wrote the phrase was disciplined and is no longer a member of the United States delegation.
